exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- (msum_plus nat Nat.add 0 (fun j : nat => f (S i + j)) (fun i : nat => f i) _ n) at 1.
exceptions.exn: In environment i, n : nat f : nat -> nat H : i < n The term "nat" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "monoid_theory ?m ?u".

original: intros H. rewrite <- (msum_plus nat Nat.add 0 (fun j : nat => f (S i + j)) (fun i : nat => f i) _ n) at 1. 2: { simpl. intros i0. auto. } simpl. rewrite <- Nat.add_succ_r. rewrite (msum_sum nat Nat.add 0 (fun x : nat => f x) (fun y : nat => 0)). { simpl. apply Nat.add_assoc. } { intros i0 j [Hlt1 Hlt2]. reflexivity. }
